comments.author: Matt
comments.body: Greetings from the scenic Akron-Canton Airport in the great state of Ohio! I sit here perched in from of spacious vistas of airport tarmac and... more airport tarmac. My flight is delayed for a little while and reading this tome is the only thing keeping me sane. Help!

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: Funny, today's ride under cloudy skies and higher humidity than we're accustomed to made it feel like the Midwest. I was thinking that Fourmile was feeling a bit neglected so I chose its gentle rollers for today's workout. Hope to see y'all out on the roads later this week.

comments.author: Kevin
comments.body: I had a nice climb up Sunshine. I left late and directly from the CC, so I didn't see any other Frenz. There were quite a few others on the roads, though, taking advantage of the nice weather.
